attributes.action: give everybody in the uk a job
attributes.additional_details: there are currently 2.51 million people unemployed in the uk with claimant count of jsa at 1.5 million, at present 490,000 vacancies, and 1.9 million companies that employ people, why dony every company in britain just make 1 vancancy available to all the un employed people on jsa in the uk at the national minimum rate, with help from the government of course, the government will get back there tax rate from the employed person, instead of the tax payers having to fork out £71 a week for 1.5 million people which is a whopping £106.5 million pound !! come on Rt Hon George Osborne it doesnt take a genius to work out the sums and how much better off we all would be if you asked every uk company to make a vacancy for 1 person. The benefit system can then be scrapped for the able bodied person
